#summary Instructions on how to make a new Maven release.

= Prerequisites =
 * Google code account and admin of this project
 * Admin of project on maven central
 * all changes committed
 * [https://docs.sonatype.org/display/Repository/How+To+Generate+PGP+Signatures+With+Maven GPG key generated and published] for signing the artifacts ([http://elgg.wlug.org.nz/pg/pages/view/8060/gnupg troubleshooting])

= Making a release =

The following commands generate a new release:

{{{
mvn release:clean
mvn release:prepare  -Dusername=<googlecode-user> -Dpassword=<googlecode-password>
mvn release:perform  -Dusername=<googlecode-user> -Dpassword=<googlecode-password>
}}}

Or in a single command:

{{{
mvn release:clean release:prepare release:perform -Dusername=<googlecode-user> -Dpassword=<googlecode-password>
}}}

In order to skip tests (if any), append the following parameter:

{{{
 -Darguments="-DskipTests=true"
}}}
